Text: Professional Services Agreement Cc Following up on our meeting last week we need to get a Professional Services Agreement in place with Technip USA Corp We do not anticipate a need for utilizing their resources until FebMarch at the soonest but as these agreements sometimes take a while to negotiate I believe it appropriate to start this one soon The contact person at Technip USA is Gerald W Alves PE Commercial Vice President Technip USA Corporation Post Oak Boulevard Suite Phone Fax Email echnipcom As discussed we need a general type Professional Services Agreement so that we can draw upon any of their resources at previously established rates on an as required basis Please let me know how we should proceed with getting this agreement in place Regards James

Professional Services Agreement with Paragon Cc As most Engineering Contractors are beginning to staff up it is prudent for us to have more than one Professional Services Agreements in place for the VLNG Front End Engineering Design effort Another Company that I have delt with in the past and which also provided assistance to Enron on the Dabhol Power Project is Paragon Engineering Services Inc As requested for Technip USA in my email of Dec please begin negotiations with Paragon Engineering Services for a Professional Services Agreement to be in place in the FebMarch timeframe The contact person at Paragon is Richard Durfee Project Manager Paragon Engineering Services Inc Clay Road Houston Texas Phone Fax Email Thanks and regards James Forwarded by James McMillanENRONDEVELOPMENT on PM James McMillan AM To Michelle CT cc Subject Professional Services Agreement Michelle Following up on our meeting last week we need to get a Professional Services Agreement in place with Technip USA Corp We do not anticipate a need for utilizing their resources until FebMarch at the soonest but as these agreements sometimes take a while to negotiate I believe it appropriate to start this one soon The contact person at Technip USA is Gerald W Alves PE Commercial Vice President Technip USA Corporation Post Oak Boulevard Suite Phone Fax Email echnipcom As discussed we need a general type Professional Services Agreement so that we can draw upon any of their resources at previously established rates on an as required basis Please let me know how we should proceed with getting this agreement in place Regards James

Volker Eyermann ContractI would appreciate an update on your thought on the Volker Eyermann Contract that I gave you during our meeting a couple of weeks ago We need to get something before Volker soon so that he can have an opportunity to review and comment before we start on January in Kansas City Regards James
